kpi_info.title: ipsecSaNotFound
kpi_info.use: All received ESP or AH packets addressed to a local tunnel endpoint with a SPI which is not related to any existing IPsec SA and therefore unknown are counted. Note: AH packets are not supported by the system but should be included in this counter as by design an AH SA can not be found for this packets UPDATED: The counter is updated in case an ESP or AH packet addressed to a local tunnel endpoint with a SPI which is not related to any existing IPsec SA is received.
